text: Gail Lýnn Kathan (born October 28, 1970) is an American businessperson, inventor and film producer. She is the founder of Harmonic Hope. Lynn is best known for her invention of the Harmonic Egg. She was born in Southfield, Michigan. Lynn began her career in the automotive industry. In 1997, Lynn shifted to the telecommunications industry. Following her tenure in telecommunication, Lynn became the executive producer of Protecting the King in 2007. In 2016, Lynn invented Harmonic Egg, a device inspired by her personal journey with sound and light therapy. By 2017, Lynn successfully developed a prototype and collaborated with manufacturers to produce Harmonic Eggs. == Filmography == Year Title Role Notes 2007 Protecting the King Executive producer 2024 It's Time Producer Documentary == References == == Other websites == * Gail Lynn at IMDb * The Harmonic Egg at Luxe
title: Gail Lýnn
